name: apps.manifest.delete
desc: Permanently deletes an app created through app manifests

app_id.desc: The ID of the app you want to delete.

errors.app_not_eligible: The specified app is not elgible for this API.
errors.app_not_found: The specified app was not found.
errors.invalid_app_id: The app ID passed in was invalid.
errors.no_permission: User described by the used token does not have proper permissions to take this action.
errors.published_app_only: This action is only permitted for published app IDs.
